article_title: Jim Geraghty identifies another glitch in 'Obama's America' – twitchy.com
article_text:
@jimgeraghty @Tracinski Good point. Maybe just tax people if they don't do the voluntary quarantine so it will pass SCOTUS muster.

— DDB (@DDB66) October 27, 2014
